DOC.brief_summary: The aim research project evaluate health-promoting disease-preventive intervention old foreign-born adult . The overarch goal intervention preserve participant 's health , quality life , minimize need medical care .
DOC.brief_title: RCT Health-promoting Intervention Older Foreign-born Adults
DOC.criteria: Foreignborn Finland five country Western Balkans ( BosniaHerzegovina , Croatia , Macedonia , Montenegro , Serbia ) 70 year age old Living Angered , Gothenburg Living ordinary housing Not dependent informal formal help daily activity Impaired cognition , Mini Mental State Examination ( MMSE ) 80 % administer item
